bibl.title: The Aetia: Callimachus' Poem of Knowledge.
bibl.note: Examines two structural features: the different sections of the poem; and the relation of these sections. - P. 59: Appendix: Catullus' Callimachean book and the Lock of Berenice.
bibl.seg: HUTCHINSON G.O., The Aetia: Callimachus' Poem of Knowledge.
Examines two structural features: the different sections of the poem; and the relation of these sections. - P. 59: Appendix: Catullus' Callimachean book and the Lock of Berenice.
